title: Mountain Plumbing MT951/VB Classic Touch Waste Disposer Air Switch, Venetian Bronze
description: Mountain's Classic Touch air switch provides safe, convenient disposer activation. No wet hands fear. Perfect for island installations! This is the one you saw on the PBS series This Old House! For use with ALL continuous feed waste disposers with attached Power Cords. Round style push button with 1-3/8-Inch mounting hole. No Tools Required for Installation! UL approved and available in 20 plated finishes.
